summary: The standard, Bright and Dark Plate Armor set from the game \"Fable\"
descriptionHtml:
This is the Plate Armor recreated from the game \"Fable\" from Lionhead Studios 

This armor can be crafted at any forge. The player must obtain Steel Smithing to craft the standard Plate Armor. Daedric Smithing is required to craft the Dark/Bright Plate set. 

Update 1.1

Added 
Archon\'s Battle Armor is available to craft if the player has obtained the Dragon Armor perk
Holy/Daemon Warrior Helmets are available to craft if the player has obtained the Daedric Armor perk

Fixes
All armor fully compatable for male/female/all races
Re-skinned the entire armor again from scratch which fixed several clipping issues
Increased overall size of the chest slightly
Reduced shoulder pad size slightly
Remade all groud items with improved collision boxes
Fixed an issue where players could see through the mesh in 1st person
Renamed all armor to \"Hero\" prefix instead of \"Fable\"

Known Issues
Weight slider not implemented
Male facial hair clips through all helmets
Multiple minor clipping issues with the armor
